column1: I love the new features in this app! It's amazing.
Worst service ever. I am never coming back.
The event was okay, nothing special.
So excited about my new phone! It's awesome!
I feel so down today. Everything is just terrible.
The weather is fine, not too hot, not too cold.
Totally bored. Can't wait for the weekend.
Such a great experience with customer support today.
